title: The most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi regarding seeing a crocodile in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a crocodile in a dream: The dream of a crocodile is considered one of the dreams that causes panic and fear in the dreamer, as it carries many meanings, some of which are good and some of which are bad. Seeing a crocodile in a dream: The crocodile is a predatory animal, as its wild form is not good at all and symbolizes it and is characterized by deception and cunning. Therefore, seeing it in a dream and in reality It is not much different because in reality the crocodile causes a person to panic and threatens his life. The interpretation of seeing a crocodile in a dream shows betrayal of any kind and also shows deceived hypocrites who show love and affection for the dreamer and behind his back he talks about him with all evil and meets to plan the dreamer. Evil. Seeing a crocodile in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The crocodile is one of the creatures that has the ability to live in more than one place, such as land and sea. It follows that seeing a crocodile in a dream indicates the presence of hypocritical people who have many faces that reveal who they are. A lot of people dream of love and faith, which is the opposite, and they hold them with hatred and resentment. Ibn Sirin also explained that if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is dragging a crocodile from the sea, then this is good news for the dreamer and indicates that if there is an enemy of the dreamer or a competitor, then the dreamer will do so. . You will defeat him. If someone intends to harm him, there is no need to worry because he will be victorious, God willing, and God knows best. The crocodile in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiFahd Al-Osaimi says that seeing a crocodile in a dream means abandoning disobedience, sins, and mistakes and returning and repenting to God. Fahd Al-Osaimi also believes that seeing a crocodile indicates circumstances. The difficulty that the dreamer faces, but when a married woman sees a crocodile, this indicates that there are disputes and disagreements between her and her husband, and that her husband is distinguished by his qualities that are absolutely good. The specialized online dream interpretation website features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type online dream interpretation site on Google. Seeing a crocodile in a dream for a single woman: A crocodile in a girl’s dream symbolizes the many fears and injustices that this girl may face, but if she sees in her dream that she was able to kill a crocodile and get rid of it, this symbolizes that she will gain a lot from Goodness and blessings in her life, and if she has enemies, the dream portends her deliverance from them. When an unmarried woman sees a crocodile trying to chase her in her dream, this means that there are many problems and fears in her life and she is subjected to severe oppression, but if she escapes from the crocodile and is able to escape When an unmarried woman sees a small crocodile in her dream, this means that the problems will end. Seeing a small crocodile in one dream indicates that this girl is worried about a specific thing, and if this girl is a student, this fear is due to exams, and if this girl is going to get married. This fear will arise from the responsibilities that she will face from marriage. When the little crocodile chases the unmarried girl, that girl will suffer great injustice and face many problems, but if that girl can escape from the little crocodile

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating bread with dates

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about eating bread with dates God Almighty is kind to His servants, many of the blessings are food, God created food for us and was kind to us in it and made different types, food is the engine and the basic dynamo of the human body that it provides. We have energy and also make us able to perform our vital functions, and different food groups such as proteins, carbohydrates, etc., and each group has its function in providing the body with the element it needs, whether it is protein, energy, or vitamins. We will provide you with an interpretation of a dream about eating bread with dates. Interpretation of dreams All Date bread for singles Dates are considered one of the most important foods that contain the elements that the body needs, as they provide the body with vitamins and fibers that help in the digestion process, in addition to improving the work of the digestive system and avoiding digestive problems and performing the necessary tasks. Seeing that he is eating bread and it was delicious, this indicates that he will get married soon. The dream of a single girl that she is baking bread indicates her success in her practical and social life as well. In addition, seeing an unmarried woman eating dates indicates the good that awaits her. Eating bread, and the bread was hard, because it had some obstacles to solving. But eating barley bread indicates that she is kind and close to God. Eating bread in a dream for a married woman Bread is one of the most important types of food that a person relies on for his nutrition and is classified within the carbohydrate group, which is an important category that provides the body with the energy needed to perform specific vital functions in addition to running. Daily activities we do. Eating white bread in a dream indicates the goodness and livelihood that awaits her. Also, when a married woman sees her husband eating bread from her hand, this indicates her husband's love for her and her great position in his heart. The fact that a married woman prepares bread for her children indicates pregnancy. A married woman who offers bread to the deceased indicates the changes she sees in her social life. Watching her bread indicates that she is fair, especially if she has some work. Interpretation of a dream about warm bread in a dream Bread is one of the most important ingredients in life and is the mainstay of all tables. You cannot skip it, as it provides the body with energy and contains nutrients such as fiber, especially if it is made from wheat. A friend of man and helps him in good digestion. The visionary who takes bread from the oven suggests the fulfillment of his hopes. The large warm bread indicates the flow of money to the visionary and his huge source of livelihood. In addition, seeing the bread burnt indicates a calamity and loss for the dreamer, such as the death of a sick person. Also, seeing the dreamer biting warm bread predicts the occurrence of a serious event. As for if the dreamer sees moldy bread, this indicates his injury and throwing it in his eye. Interpretation of dreams Every piece of loaf of bread Bread is one of the oldest foods that people have relied on since ancient times for its high nutritional value, as it contains carbohydrates that the body needs to provide energy, and some types of bread contain fibers that help

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of a dream about a monkey by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: Interpretations of leading scholars for seeing a monkey in a dream. Many of us dream of different animals, whether they are predators or pets, but the monkey in a dream is one of the animals that gives many interpretations, some of which are promising and others are disgusting. With an Egyptian website, we will show you all the interpretations in various forms. Read with us the following and from here you will know. The message of your dream, is it negative or positive? Interpretation of a dream about a monkey. The meaning of a monkey in a dream is that the dreamer’s money will be stolen and that he will own it in this world, even his house will be taken from him, and the vision proves that the dreamer is a person who does not own anything. Intelligence at all to be harnessed to get out of his predicament, so this dream is a warning of deprivation. According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, if the dreamer sees monkeys in a dream, this confirms that he will either deal with the Jews or mix with people who have many characteristics of the Jews, such as deception, lying, and Zionist thinking, because God (Glory be to Him). ) I punished the Jews and made them monkeys, as stated in the following Qur’an (And indeed I recognized among you those who violated the Sabbath, so We said to them: Be apes, O oppressors). When a monkey appears in a dream, the vision means an obscene and great sin committed by the dreamer, and if the dreamer sees that he has taken a monkey or bought it This vision indicates an enemy that the dreamer will face, and if the dreamer is riding on the back of a monkey in the dream, this is evidence of his victory over his arch enemy. If a married man dreams that he enters his own room and finds a monkey sitting on his bed, then this dream is a symbol that his wife will not protect him in the future. His absence, as she is currently cheating on him with one of the men. Al-Nabulsi confirmed that the dreamer seeing a monkey in his dream means that he is a human being with a defect, and this defect often means any flaw in his morals and personality, as he lacks many qualities to be respectable. And a useful person. If the dreamer is evil and uses to destroy others, steal their money, take their property, and sees a monkey in his dream, it means that God will send him someone who will be an occasion to crush and defeat him. And he reduced his value in front of people so that he would not repeat his bad deeds. If the dreamer dreams that he is fighting with a monkey, then if the dreamer picks him up, this means that he will suffer from a minor illness and soon recover again. Doctors are still discovering a cure for it. An important indicator of a dream about a monkey is that the dreamer He is cunning and treats people with tricks and deception, and the dream means that the dreamer will complain of misery and hunger soon. If the dreamer dreams that he is carrying a monkey on his shoulders, this means that he took something and put it in his house, and after a while this thing will come out of the house, and people will know that he is a thief. , and soon it is rumored to be a scandal. If the dreamer sees that he is in a forest full of monkeys, then this dream means that the dreamer is visiting a market with many fraudulent sellers who steal from their customers. If the dreamer chases a monkey in his dream, this is interpreted as carrying with him trust that belongs to people He knows them, and unfortunately they did not trust him, and he took the trust and lost it. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. Monkey Small

title: Interpretation of a dream about taking a selfie in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about taking a selfie in a dream and its meaning. Due to the progress and development that humanity is experiencing in terms of technology and technology, the primitive and old methods used in the photography process have been eliminated, as photography was done through a camera, as it took time to develop and produce images. But now it has become easy and simple to take quick photos with high accuracy and quality using a modern mobile camera, and in this article, the interpretation of the dream that you are taking a selfie in a dream and its meaning will be discussed.Interpretation of the dream of taking a selfie from a woman’s dreamThis dream is considered one of the important dreams in a woman’s dream whether She was married, pregnant, or divorced, as this dream has a number of clear symbols, which are as follows: A woman’s depiction of landscapes in her dream indicates living in fantasies and fantasies, avoiding reality and facing life. Also, exchanging pictures of the wife with her husband or with the family Or friends, it expresses the presence of mutual feelings, love, and intimacy. Whereas if a married woman sees in her dream that the pictures are cut or burned. There is no doubt that this is separation, alienation, and separation between friends and between family and relatives. If the pictures are related to the husband, this indicates the appearance Marital problems and disturbances that may lead to separation and divorce. In the event that a woman is pregnant and sees herself taking a selfie in a dream. This indicates that she visited her doctor who was monitoring the pregnancy to ensure the condition of the fetus. Also, the same vision may indicate hearing good and new news related to the fetus or The time of childbirth may be approaching. While if she sees that someone is photographing her in the dream, this expresses her extreme fear and anxiety about childbirth and her suffering. As for a divorced woman who sees pictures hanging in her room, this indicates that it is easy to deceive her. While good and beautiful pictures symbolize the psychological state Good, positive and stable women. It should be noted that buying photos in a dream is undesirable, because it indicates deception and deceit from some people. Interpretation of a dream about taking a selfieSee also: Interpretation of seeing a photo in a dream and its full implicationsDream of taking a selfie in one dreamGirls use a lot of Selfies in their real lives, so they enjoy them, but what are the consequences of that if we see them in a dream, where these indicators are as follows: This dream in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that this girl is lying to herself until she is convinced of things and matters that do not suit her. Likewise, Photographing herself in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes the times and moments she lives. In addition, the same vision symbolizes that this girl will be exposed to some obstacles, bumps, and shocks in her real life. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees that she is photographing another person in the dream, then this It indicates her attempt to find a partner for her life. It is expected that this same dream in her dream indicates that she will approach a relationship and marriage. Also, the girl hanging pictures in her home in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a person combing my hair for a single woman and its most important meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone combing my hair for a single woman: An unmarried woman may see in her dream that someone is combing her hair, and the scholar Ibn Sirin considered this vision a good vision, especially if the unmarried woman’s hair is smooth, and the curly hair in the unmarried woman’s dream is not. She is popular among her scholars and may threaten her with academic failure or emotional failure. And we will review the lines of our article to show anything related to the interpretation of a dream about someone combing my hair for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s hairstyle Combing hair in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, is a praiseworthy dream, especially for unmarried women, as it means her marriage. Short hair in a dream It means obtaining a high status. Also, a short hairstyle shows rich knowledge. If the dreamer sees that someone is combing his hair and it shows a lot of frizz, this means that there are obstacles in the dreamer's way. If the dreamer sees that he is combing his hair and it is wooden, this means his absolute belief in envy. If the dreamer sees that the dead man is combing his hair, it means a lot of sustenance and many good things for the dreamer. While the dreamer sees that someone is giving him a comb as a gift and it is made of silver, this is an indication that he will get money. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving his wife a comb made of wood , this means that the woman will become pregnant soon. If a married woman dreams that she is combing the hair of one of her children, this means the comfort that she will enjoy in the next period of her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a Christian in a dream Interpretation of seeing a hair comb in a dream There are different interpretations of seeing a comb in a dream. A dream, as it varies depending on the material that makes up the comb, in addition to the color of the comb that has meaning in the dream, and in the following paragraph I will give you the interpretation of seeing a hair comb in a dream: As commentators say, the silver comb is a sign that the person is making new friends. And this It also means that the dreamer will receive benefit from his friends. If the comb in the dream is made of gold, it means the high status that the dreamer has. In addition, a golden comb in a person’s dream means that he will get married soon. Whereas if the comb is made of plastic , it means success and luck, but also high grades. If an unmarried woman sees that she is combing her hair with a metal comb, this means that a man is trying to get close to her. This also means that he should pay attention to this person. A golden comb in a married woman’s dream is a sign of her blessing For a male child. While a wooden comb in a married woman’s dream means that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. To dream of an iron comb for a married woman means that there are problems between her and her family or one of her relatives. Interpretation of a dream about someone combing my hair in a dream about a single girl, according to Ibn Sirin. An unmarried girl who did not She has been married before if she dreams that someone she does not know is combing her hair and her hair is fine in the dream. For an unmarried Ibn Sirin girl: Seeing an unmarried woman combing her hair with a wooden comb indicates the presence of a good friend whom she will meet soon. The thing is...

title: What is the interpretation of an old house in a dream and its meaning in good and evil?

preview.html: Find out the interpretation of an old house in a dream and what its symbols are in reality. Seeing an old house in a dream is considered one of the most ambiguous dreams in its meaning, especially if it is a house that the dreamer does not know in reality, and sometimes some may feel nostalgic to return to their old house in which they lived and left. He has many beautiful memories, but this dream carries many different interpretations depending on the situation, which you can see through the encyclopedia. Interpretation of the old house in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned that if a person dreams that he lives in an old house, then this vision indicates that he is going through difficulties Financially in his life. Selling a house in a dream indicates an end to the problems that the dreamer is suffering from. Seeing an old house destroyed in a dream indicates that something unpleasant will happen to the owner, which is divorce if he gets married in reality. If a person sees in his dream that he is building a house and discovers Immediately because it is an old house, then this vision indicates a failure to achieve a goal that he was striving for in reality, and God knows best. Buying an old house in a dream indicates something unpleasant, which is the emergence of many problems in the life of the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an old house for a woman In the case of an unmarried woman, if she sees that she is wandering around in an old house, then this vision is unpleasant and indicates the presence of a problem in reality, and God knows best. Seeing that she is buying an old house in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her relationship with a person facing difficult circumstances in reality, and God knows best. And in the event that she sees an unmarried woman That she has an old house, so this vision indicates her marriage to a poor man, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about an old house for a married woman: This dream brought a number of different interpretations for a married woman, the most important of which are the following: If a married woman sees in her dream an old house that she is selling, then this vision shows goodness and an end. The problems and worries that she suffers from in reality. Seeing a married woman living in an old house means something unpleasant, which is the emergence of problems such as financial distress. Buying an old house in a dream for a married woman indicates something unpleasant, which is the emergence of problems in reality. If a married woman dreams that she She is renovating an old house, then this dream is evidence of her desire to alleviate the burdens and pressures of life on her and her husband. The dream of destroying the old house in a married woman’s dream indicates her attempt to get rid of the problems and obstacles that she suffers from in reality. If a married woman sees that she is opening an old house, this The vision symbolizes the appearance of some people she knew in the past. Interpretation of seeing an old house in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing an old house in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the unpleasant dreams that indicate problems in her life on the ground. Selling the old house in a pregnant woman’s dream symbolizes comfort. From fatigue and imminent childbirth, or it may indicate the ease of childbirth and the safety of the newborn’s health. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is buying an old house that she does not know, then this vision indicates that she is looking for trouble.

title: When I was pregnant, I dreamed that I was pregnant and fell

preview.html: When I was pregnant, I dreamed that I was pregnant and stumbled upon a site, seeing the site roy2a.com. Pregnancy is considered one of the happiest periods of pregnancy for a woman. On the other hand, the occurrence of a miscarriage causes physical and psychological problems, many of which, in particular, seeing a miscarriage in a dream for a pregnant woman causes discomfort, stress, and anxiety and makes one He is looking for the meaning behind this vision, so we will present the most important interpretations given by the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn. Shaheen Follow us. When I was pregnant, I dreamed that I was pregnant and had a miscarriage. Seeing a miscarriage in a woman’s dream indicates when the menstrual period is approaching if she is not actually pregnant. Seeing a miscarriage in a dream is also considered an indication of the effort expended without a real or visible result experienced by the dreamer. Seeing the miscarriage of the fetus and its appearance is ugly or like something Black came out of it, as it suggests the emergence of envy, magic, and relief from the anguish and sadness that quickly dominated her life. I dreamed that I was pregnant and gave birth to twins. This vision indicates a smooth and easy birth that this woman will go through and that she and her fetus will be healthy. Seeing a miscarriage in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates her freedom from worries. And the hardships that he endured throughout the past period. Imam Al-Sadiq says that he sees miscarriage in a dream as a sign of anxiety and fear about the future. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman and having children in a dream When I was pregnant, I dreamed that I was pregnant and fell in love with Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says about my wife who saw that she She fell in a dream. If she sees a fetus, it is good for her that there will be a lot of good and abundant food for her in the future. Seeing a fetus during a miscarriage in a woman’s dream indicates that she will get a lot of money or good news will reach her in the near future. If a non-pregnant woman sees that she fell In a dream, it is an indication that she will repent for her actions or sins and return to God. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant unmarried girl in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a miscarriage in a dream. Seeing a miscarriage in a dream can be a sign of many psychological pressures and problems that the dreamer is suffering from. Seeing a miscarriage in a dream A married woman’s dream: A woman who is awaiting news of her pregnancy has a lot of anxiety and stress and constantly thinks about the topic of pregnancy, which leads to sadness and tension. Seeing blood with a miscarriage in a dreamWith the appearance of the happy thing, the priest comes. Seeing a miscarriage in a man’s dream indicates getting rid of problems and crises that hinder one’s progress. A man sees that his wife miscarried in a dream. She is not pregnant, it is news of an imminent pregnancy. Interpretation of seeing another person miscarrying in a dream. A married woman’s vision that there is a woman who knows that she miscarries the fetus in a dream is a sign of bad relations and disagreements between them. Seeing a woman miscarrying in a dream and leading her to death, is an indication of bad relations and disagreements between them. Wrong solutions to problems, leaving the cable useless in order for things to progress. Seeing a miscarriage in a dream can signify recovery from illness or relief from psychological problems and crises. Read an explanation

title: Interpretation of a dream about a gold chain in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing a gold chain in a dream Dreams can be defined as a series of images in addition to thoughts and feelings that occur in the mind without the individual's will, as this occurs during a certain stage of sleep, you may also be interested in knowing Friday in a dream. Also, until now, the world of dreams has not been clearly understood, as it contains a lot of speculation in many scientific and philosophical journals, as well as religious journals. Each of these fields sees dreams differently, so in this article we discuss one of the most important dreams that occupies the minds of many people, which is the solution to seeing gold in a dream, as there are many interpretations and meanings of this vision, according to what was mentioned in many books of interpretation. Read also: Toilet in a dream Meaning of seeing a gold chain in a dream Meaning of seeing a gold chain in a dream Seeing gold in a dream is still one of the visions that carry many meanings and associations, and below we learn about the most important interpretations of seeing a gold chain, according to what Ibn Sirin, one of the great scholars of interpretation, said. It is as follows: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is wearing a gold chain with some pieces of iron. This indicates that he has a strong personality and is known to the world for his courage. If the dreamer talks about sins and sees in the dream that he is wearing a gold chain with pieces of iron. This indicates that he is one of the infidels who will enter the fire, and God knows best. Seeing a gold chain in a dream and studded with stones. It indicates the strength of the dreamer and his great ability to overcome difficulties. Read also: Interpretation of dreams and visions with torn clothes in a dream The meaning of seeing a gold chain in a married woman's dream There are also many interpretations that indicate the meaning of seeing a gold chain in a dream for a married woman, and this is what we learn as follows: If a married woman dreams that she is wearing a gold chain on her wrist or feet. This indicates that they hate her. A married woman if she dreams that she is buying gold in a dream. This indicates the righteousness of her children and that God will bless her with righteous offspring. If a married woman sees in a dream a silver chain turning into a gold chain, this means that pregnancy will happen soon. A married woman sees in her dream that her husband is bound with gold chains. This indicates that the ways Life is scarce and exposed to some misfortunes. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is wearing a gold necklace, this indicates her husband's love for her and his extraordinary loyalty. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Meaning of seeing a gold chain for a divorced woman We also explain here the meaning of seeing a gold chain in a dream for a divorced woman, according to what some imams of interpretation said. Seeing a gold chain in a dream for a divorced woman indicates remarriage. Seeing a divorced woman wearing a gold chain in a dream indicates some positive changes that occur in her life. It also symbolizes the possibility of finding a job. It indicates an improvement in physical conditions and a feeling of psychological comfort. A divorced woman sees in her dream a gold chain that has been cut or damaged. This indicates her fear of facing

title: Interpretation of a dream about smelling feet and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the smell of the feet in a dream. There is no doubt that the smell of the feet causes distress and disgust in reality and is considered one of the unpleasant odors that humans repel, just as it is known as an odor caused by wearing shoes for a long period of time. A dream also, in the form of a dream and a vision, as many dreams have important interpretations and associations, and some of them do not mean anything, so that they are just fantasies and false dreams, and in this article we will explain the interpretation of seeing the smell of the feet in a dream.Interpretation of seeing the bad smell by Ibn SirinIn general, bad smells Causing inconvenience to people, as this is in reality, and we will see here Ibn Sirin’s opinion regarding unpleasant odors in a dream: Seeing someone smelling unpleasant odors indicates bad and immoral actions that do not fit with the morals of society. This vision also indicates the sins and misdeeds committed by the owner. The vision, which is interpreted by revealing it soon to people. This vision is likely to be a sign from God to the servant to return his bad deeds and repent to God Almighty. Whereas if a girl sees in her dream a foul smell coming from a man, this means that she is facing a problem between them, but it will end. If An unmarried woman smells an unpleasant smell from a disabled person, then this indicates her desire to marry him. What do they need to make sure of his health? As for a married woman, when she notices that she smells bad in a dream, this indicates that she has committed many sins. Therefore, these sins will be the reason for making her life worse. Miserable, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the smell of feet. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the smell of the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the smell of feet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The smell of the feet is classified as one of the most hated smells, so that a person avoids exposing himself to it or being offended by others, and during In these lines, we will see the interpretation of this vision by Ibn Sirin as follows: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the smell of the feet carries a warning message to the beholder. There is no doubt that this message is in the interest of the viewer in terms of his attention to the decisions he makes in his life. Therefore, what he must do is make these decisions More rational, wise, and logical. Another indication of this vision is that the dreamer is actually watching and watching what the person he saw in his dream is doing. If the dreamer sees that he smells feet in a dream, this means warning him not to work and focus on the lives of others. Interpretation of a dream about feet smell. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a toilet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a bad odor of feet in a dream for a single woman. Girls suffer from disturbing and disturbing visions, and therefore they feel stressed as a result of these dreams. A girl smelling a bad odor in a dream is evidence of false rumors about that girl. There is no doubt that she will refute these rumors. It proves the facts and clarifies the mysterious issues for everyone behind them. While an unmarried girl sees in her dream that there is a person emitting unpleasant odors, this indicates that problems are simmering between her and him. But these problems will disappear immediately, and thus the dispute will end.

title: Interpretation of seeing a coffin in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFansInterpretation of seeing a wooden coffin in Ibn Sirin’s dream for an unmarried woman and a man who desires and marries a person who has influence and position and makes her happy.Interpretation of a coffin in a dream for a married womanThe vision shows that a woman for good and a lot of money, a big change in life for the better.But if she dreams of an iron coffin, it symbolizes Due to poverty and need for money, the husband is in debt, and if he refuses to pay he will be imprisoned. A dream of a silver or golden coffin indicates a woman’s support for a child born of God. You saw I am carrying the coffin. Manami is exposed to the problems and conflicts of her life. Interpretation of seeing coffins in a dream for a single woman is evidence of her marriage to a man of great status and influence. And strength to satisfy her heart. Positive changes in her life and she is very happy with a new place where she feels safe. I saw the golden casket. She is attached to it and lives a luxurious and dignified life. In my dream I saw the coffin on the dead carriage as it is, which indicates that the truth was followed when she said it, and her opinion was correct. In my dream, I saw the elements of moving and traveling to another place and living in luxury and integrity. I dreamed of a coffin and stood in fear, symbolizing success in her life or obtaining a dream job. The coffin is wooden and black in color. In the dream of an unmarried girl, this indicates differences and problems in her life and she is going through a period of distress. A stranger leads me in a coffin in a dream as a sign that I am on the right path and gives him a lot of advice and instructions. A glass coffin in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates her closeness to the Creator, her piety, and her adherence to religious beliefs. The transparent glass coffin in an unmarried girl’s dream symbolizes that she is a distinguished girl. With purity and chastity in her relationship with others, and among the good and good qualities. Interpretation of the dream of a coffin in which there is a living person for a person. Visions that announce goodness, closeness to God, and distance from disobedience and transgressions. It expresses the disappearance of multiple differences and facilitates many things in one’s life. It means advancement and high status that the dreamer has achieved In a short period of time. It indicates the abundance of money that makes money and money and is satisfied with it and achieves what he wants. Interpretation of a dream about a wooden coffin. The vision symbolizes the rise of business and achieving a promotion or a prominent position. It expresses respect and a good example for people to the dreamer. And if so, make a coffin with your own hands. In the dream, It expresses rational thinking about fateful and important decisions. Interpretation of seeing a Christian coffin in a dream. Seeing a Christian coffin in a dream symbolizes the elimination of many problems, anxiety, and a difficult stage for the dreamer. But if the dreamer has many debts, this is a sign of the cessation of misfortune, the repayment of debts, and the improvement of material conditions. The dream of a Christian coffin is a guide. On excellence in practice and the satisfaction of the manager. Interpretation of carrying the coffin with the deceased for an unmarried woman. Proof of marriage and stability in a short period. I saw the coffin in a dream with a dead person inside it, a sign of happy changes in his life. I dreamed that I was inside the coffin and it was golden in color, that I would marry a rich man who would save her. From all the disagreements and financial crises she was experiencing. I saw the same
